content:
New York City is arguably one of the most desired destinations for shopping in the world, and WestHouse Hotel enjoys a convenient location to the best shopping in NYC. With Fifth Avenue just two blocks away, shop luxury designers and boutiques just steps away from our hotel. Home to some of the finest shopping in Manhattan, explore the unrivaled elite in fashion a short walk away at Bergdorf Goodman, located on Fifth Avenue between 57th and 58th Street.
 
For ultimate luxury, Barneys New York and the The Shops at Columbus Circle offer a wide variety of top designers and the latest trends in fashion. 
 
WestHouse Hotel welcomes the fashion aficionado with unparalleled access to the best shopping in NYC.
